item.title: 1 Million Stolen Credit Cards Given Away Free On Dark Web Forum
item.description: A hacker has given away a stash of 1,018,014 stolen credit cards on a dark web crime forum. What you need to know.

item.title: Hackers Share 3.9 Billion Stolen Passwords—What You Need To Know
item.description: The infostealer threat to your passwords continues to grow—now there are 3.9 billion reasons why you need to take it seriously.
